user.title: W100 Smart Control Setup
user.description: Set up your Aqara W100 Smart Control integration. Make sure you have Zigbee2MQTT configured and your W100 devices paired.

device_selection.title: Select W100 Device
device_selection.description: Choose the W100 device you want to configure. Found {device_count} accessible W100 device(s) via Zigbee2MQTT.

climate_selection.title: Climate Entity Configuration
climate_selection.description: Choose how to configure the climate entity. Found {climate_count} existing climate entities.

generic_thermostat.title: Generic Thermostat Configuration
generic_thermostat.description: Configure the generic thermostat that will be created for your W100 device.

customization.title: Customization Options
customization.description: Configure the behavior and preferences for your W100 device.

error.mqtt_not_configured: MQTT is not configured. Please set up MQTT integration first.
error.device_not_found: Selected W100 device was not found.
error.device_not_accessible: W100 device is not accessible via Zigbee2MQTT.
error.discovery_failed: Failed to discover W100 devices. Check that Zigbee2MQTT is running and accessible.
error.no_devices_found: No W100 devices found. Make sure your Aqara W100 devices are paired with Zigbee2MQTT and accessible via MQTT topics.
error.no_climate_entities: No climate entities found. Please create a climate entity first or choose to create a generic thermostat.
error.no_climate_entities_available: No climate entities are available. Please create a climate entity first or choose to create a generic thermostat instead.
error.not_climate_entity: Selected entity is not a climate entity.
error.entity_unavailable: Selected climate entity is currently unavailable.
error.heat_mode_not_supported: Selected climate entity does not support heat mode, which is required for W100 control.
error.off_mode_not_supported: Selected climate entity does not support off mode, which is required for W100 control.
error.temperature_control_not_supported: Selected climate entity does not support temperature control, which is required for W100 control.
error.current_temperature_not_available: Selected climate entity does not provide current temperature readings, which are required for W100 display updates.
error.invalid_temperature_range: Selected climate entity has an invalid temperature range configuration.

abort.already_configured: This W100 device is already configured.

init.description: Configure options for your W100 Smart Control integration.
